reason: The root claim states [g_1, g_2] = (1 2 6)(3 4 5), but the verified step-by-step computation in nodes 1.4-1.10.1 proves that [g_1, g_2] = (1 7 5)(2 4 6) under the commutator definition [σ, τ] := σ^{-1} τ^{-1} σ τ. The mapping 1→7→5→1 and 2→4→6→2 with 3 fixed has been independently verified. The claimed result (1 2 6)(3 4 5) would require the alternative convention [σ, τ] := σ τ σ^{-1} τ^{-1}, which contradicts the stated definition.
